channel.title: Teleport Selection HELP please
channel.description:
I would like to have some help in making more tele options.
I currently have one saying: Which Zone? Edgeville varrock Mage Bank
[IMG]http://i809.photobucket.com/albums/zz12/blackownz67/telezone.jpg[/img]
I want to add: Pk box Fun Pk
These teles are in the talking dialog which the main text goes.
i have the co-ords for the new pk places and also already fixed up the area for pking. all i need is putting more options in to select the new places to tele to.
pk box co-ords 3108 3698
Fun pk co-ords 2007 4431
I have tried to put them in but no luck =\
This is in the clickingMost [code]case 50245: // edgeville teleport c.teleEffect = 1; c.sendQuest("Which zone?", 2470); c.sendQuest("Edgeville", 2471); c.sendQuest("varrock", 2472); c.sendQuest("Mage bank", 2473); c.sendQuest("Pk Box", 2474); c.sendQuest("Fun PK", 2475); c.sendFrame164(2469); break;[/code]
Can anyone please help me i can not figure this one out

item.title: Teleport Selection HELP please
item.dc:creator: @blindbandit blindbandit
item.description:
@blindbandit wrote:

I would like to have some help in making more tele options.

I currently have one saying:
Which Zone?
Edgeville
varrock
Mage Bank

I want to add:
Pk box
Fun Pk

These teles are in the talking dialog which the main text goes.

i have the co-ords for the new pk places and also already fixed up the area for pking. all i need is putting more options in to select the new places to tele to.

pk box co-ords
3108 3698

Fun pk co-ords
2007 4431

I have tried to put them in but no luck =\

This is in the clickingMost

case 50245: // edgeville teleport c.teleEffect = 1; c.sendQuest("Which zone?", 2470); c.sendQuest("Edgeville", 2471); c.sendQuest("varrock", 2472); c.sendQuest("Mage bank", 2473); c.sendQuest("Pk Box", 2474); c.sendQuest("Fun PK", 2475); c.sendFrame164(2469); break;

Can anyone please help me i can not figure this one out
